official_title: To direct the Attorney General to provide a written opinion regarding the constitutionality of proposed state ballot initiatives, and for other purposes.
short_title: Truth in Democracy and Legislative Responsibility Act of 1997

summary.text: Truth in Democracy and Legislative Responsibility Act of 1997 - Directs the U.S. Attorney General to issue a written opinion regarding whether a proposed State ballot initiative (if adopted) would be constitutional. Prohibits a state ballot initiative from taking effect if the Attorney General issues an opinion that the initiative (if adopted) would be unconstitutional.
